dmca.title: [ABUSE] extremely urgent, copyright violation act NOW!
dmca.body:
NC

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 03, 2006 8:25 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] extremely urgent, copyright violation act NOW!

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Thursday, March 02, 2006
at
00:13:11 and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to your
team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] extremely urgent, copyright violation act NOW!

MESSAGE BODY:
To: ThePlantet.com

This is urgent we ask you to take immediate action

following server hosted by you:

http://69.93.169.36/

has installed software purchased and liscensed to us you can view via this
url

http://69.93.169.36/a.xml

please note:
reguser="evoicecafe" regurl="www.evoicecafe.com"

this same site has copied the html/asp design elements in our software, I
will be emailing you further details on that as well shortly

This is to confirm I talked on the phone with: David in your NOC center at
10am pst and was told that I should email your abuse@theplanet.com address

I can be contacted by phone:

858-354-3064

regards
shahin mahroian 3/2/06
evoicecafe.com


RFC822 HEADERS:
Received: from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52])
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
        with esmtp (Exim)
        id 1FEsIk-0005bC-MM; Thu, 02 Mar 2006 12:13:22 -0600
Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181]
        helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)
        by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from shahin-m@evoicecafe.com)
        with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id
1FEsIi-0005b2-6h
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 02 Mar 2006 12:13:20 -0600
